image.title: Image
image.description: Optionally provide an image you would like included before your message

message.title: Message
message.default: Wishing you a wonderful New Year, from my family, to yours!

link.title: Link
link.description: Optionally provide the URL of a page you would like your visitors sent to when they click on the message.

hideBeforeToggle.title: Hide the message before a specific date

hideBefore.title: Hide Before
hideBefore.description: The message will always be shown in the preview, but it will be hidden to your site’s visitors before this date.

hideAfterToggle.title: Hide the message after a specific date

hideAfter.title: Hide After
hideAfter.description: The message will always be shown in the preview, but it will be hidden to your site’s visitors after this date.
